item.title: We're Back!
item.description: June 26, 2019. Dakar, Senegal. Binta is inputting the vegetables she sells on her Weebi tablet. The application has helped her manage her stock and sales. After a two-year hiatus, Sidy is thrilled to announce that the service is back! The application has been revamped with a new version (the 3rd) available on: Android Weebi Playstore iOS Weebi Appstore macOS link on weebi.com Windows link on weebi.com The application remains available for free, and we only ask for your email upon initialization to be able to assist you if needed.
